PG*** CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Aug. 4, 2022 /PRNewswire/
-- HubSpot, Inc. (NYSE: HUBS), the customer relationship management (CRM) platform for scaling companies, today announced financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2022.
PG***
PG*** HubSpot, Inc. logo - www.hubspot.com . (
PRNewsfoto/HubSpot).
SCBQ*** Financial Highlights:.
PG*** Revenue.
PG*** Total revenue was $421.8 million , up 36% compared to Q2'21.
PG*** Operating Income (Loss).
PG*** GAAP operating margin was (12.4%), compared to (5.3%) in Q2'21.
PG*** Non-GAAP operating margin was 7%, compared to 9% in Q2'21.
PG*** GAAP operating loss was ($52.3) million , compared to ($16.6) million in Q2'21.
